item.title: No street lights in the morning, 25th November
item.description:
No street lights in the morning on Versailles Road. Itâ€™s dangerous walking in the pitch dark. Meanwhile Thicket Road does have lights on.

item.title: Forest left on pedestrian only Datchelor Place, 25th November
item.description:
No e-bikes on this pedestrian only space. This Brookline has been relocated to end of street. Remove it please. No ebikes on pedestrianised Datchelor Place

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mary Datchelor Close, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Daily dumping of rubbish by same person, 25th November
item.description:
Daily rubbish by same person opposite front door of 53 Shifford Path despite notice to ask to put rubbish in the bins less than 20 metres away. This is happening every day by the same person- believed to live in the hmo on Shifford Path. Always dumping 3 carrier bags of rubbish every couple of days in the exact same spot.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wynell Road, Perry Vale, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole, 25th November
item.description:
Really deep pothole where manhole cover has sunk. On road at bus stop outside McDonald's. Very deep and dangerous for cyclists, especially in the dark when it is difficult to see.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charing Cross Road, Mayfair, Greater London

item.title: Pothole on crossing, 25th November
item.description:
As you approach the roundabout from Oldfield Road there is a large deep pothole near the pavement which will wreck tyres.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oldfield Road, Bickley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Teenagers Catapulting again!, 25th November
item.description:
About half 8- half 9 at night a group of lads are going around Grassmead Recreation ground shining very bright torches which shine into people's properties! Looking for poor animals to harm! I am absolutely sick of it! I have reported this before back in the summer months and Ward Security claim they can't do anything and the police never show up! So who's going to do something about it?! It sickens me and frightens me. I want to feel safe walking my dogs but do not. Someone needs to take appropriate action regarding this before someone gets hurt or someone's pet!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Finucane Drive, Ramsden, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Worn out road marking on zebra crossing, 25th November
item.description:
Road markings for zebra crossing have been worn out for months and need repainting all along Church Road. Today I was crossing the zebra near Fox Hill and waved to the oncoming driver whilst half way across the crossing. The driver carried straight on, when I looked at them they were looking straight ahead not seeing a pedestrian crossing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 135, Church Road, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple episodes of fly tipping, 25th November
item.description:
